ValidationRule.description: Third Party Vendor should not be blank in case All is Unchecked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( All_3rd_Party_Vendor__c = true, Parent_Non_Parent_VID_s__c != null, RecordType.Name = 'STP Eligibility')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If All Third Party Vendors is checked, then Listed 3rd Party Vendors must be blank.
